name: Apogee Enterprises, Inc.
description: Apogee Enterprises, Inc. is a leading provider of architectural glass, architectural framing systems, and related services. Founded in 1949 and headquartered in Bloomington, Minnesota, Apogee operates through several distinct segments including Architectural Glass, Architectural Framing, and Services. The company is dedicated to enhancing the built environment through innovative glass solutions that improve energy efficiency, safety, and aesthetics. Apogee's products are utilized in a wide range of applications, from office buildings and schools to hospitals and airports. A pioneer in the use of technology and sustainable practices, Apogee focuses on delivering high-performance products such as energy-efficient windows and customized glass solutions that meet the rigorous demands of modern architecture. With a commitment to sustainability, Apogee actively works to reduce its carbon footprint and promote environmentally responsible practices throughout its operations. The company's robust portfolio of offerings includes insulating glass units, decorative glass, and advanced glazing systems that are designed to meet the specific needs of clients. Through strategic partnerships and a focus on innovation, Apogee continues to lead the industry while addressing the evolving challenges of the architectural marketplace.
